definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: The discovery also reveals how male squid compete for female mating partners.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現也揭示了雄性烏賊如何爭奪交配伴侶的。

sentences.english: Tales of enormous squids have circulated throughout the world since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 關於巨烏賊的傳說從古代就開始在世界上不斷流傳。

sentences.english: A female cuttlefish is courted by two males.
sentences.chinese: 一隻雌性的烏賊往往會有兩個追求者。

sentences.english: Shaonei plus soup thicken pour out the oil poured on the squid.
sentences.chinese: 勺內加原湯勾芡淋明油澆在烏賊上。

sentences.english: The findings may have implications beyond squid biology.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現將會超出烏賊生物學的理解。

sentences.english: Here's a look at how they responded, from the great apes to the cuttlefish.
sentences.chinese: 來看看從類人猿到烏賊是如何面對地震的。

sentences.english: Add the squid and cabbage, mixing well to ensure they are well mixed with the batter.
sentences.chinese: 將切好的捲心菜和烏賊魚放入麪糊，充分攪勻。

sentences.english: Selection of tiger prawn, fish, squid, lobster and soft shell crab, pan seared with Kerala marinade.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉鐵板燒虎蝦，魚，烏賊，龍蝦或軟蟹。

sentences.english: To this day, the giant squid remains a legendary example of how fantastic animals on earth can be.
sentences.chinese: 今天，巨型烏賊仍然是地球上夢幻般生物的樣本。

sentences.english: They like to eat fish and squid.
sentences.chinese: 海豚喜歡喫魚和小烏賊。

sentences.english: He had no interest whatsoever in giant squids.
sentences.chinese: 他對大烏賊可沒什麼興趣。

sentences.english: They will conduct the same type of studies, but with cuttlefish instead of octopuses.
sentences.chinese: 他們進行了同樣的研究，但用烏賊代替章魚。

sentences.english: He came back up to the squid above him and started fighting with other squid.
sentences.chinese: 他游到他上面的烏賊那裏，開始向其他烏賊挑釁。

definition: tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
